Title: Spellweaver
Intro: A Spellweaver is armed with one of the following weapon options: Blows of Mystic Power; or a Heartwood Staff.

Rules.Name: Wizard
Rules.Rule: WIZARD: This unit can attempt to cast 1 spell in your hero phase and attempt to unbind 1 spell in the enemy hero phase.

Rules.Name: Ancient Blessings
Rules.Rule: ABILITIES Once per battle, when you pick this unit to attempt to cast a spell, you can say that it will draw upon ancient blessings. If you do so, that spell is automatically with a casting roll equal to the casting value of the spell that cannot be modified.

Rules.Name: Blessing Of Life
Rules.Rule: Blessing of Life: Blessing of Life has a casting value of 5 and a range of 16". If successfully cast, pick 1 friendly WANDERERS unit within range and visible to the caster. You can return up to D3 slain models to that unit.
